author: cnbc.com
title: Kinsale Capital Group Announces Dividend Declaration
text:
RICHMOND, Va., Feb. 12, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Kinsale Capital Group, Inc. (NASDAQ:KNSL) today announced that its Board of Directors declared a cash dividend of $0.07 per share of common stock. This dividend is payable on March 15, 2018 to all stockholders of record as of the close of business on February 28, 2018.
About Kinsale Capital Group, Inc.
Kinsale Capital Group, Inc. is a specialty insurance group headquartered in Richmond, Virginia, focusing on the excess and surplus lines market.
